original_title: Et avec les oreilles qu'est-ce que vous faites?
overview: Two friends, Arthur and Jérôme, want to make a film. After much hesitation, they give up their primary aspirations and opt for a trendy theme: eroticism! Benefiting from a tidy sum of money, all they have to do is find the ideal cast. But the tandem is far from imagining that this somewhat crazy project will completely change their existence.
title: Et avec les oreilles qu'est-ce que vous faites?
